_comment: CAESAR THE DAY - Regional Newsletter Template
_instructions: This template defines all possible content sections for a regional newsletter. See _CONTENT-GUIDE.md for detailed instructions on populating this template.

region._comment: Core region metadata and introductory content
region._slug_note: REQUIRED. Lowercase, hyphenated identifier (e.g., 'piemonte', 'calabria', 'provence'). Must match filename.
region._issueNumber_note: REQUIRED. Sequential number for this newsletter issue.
region._date_note: REQUIRED. Publication date in format 'Month YYYY' (e.g., 'October 2025').
region.title: Region Name: The Tagline
region._title_note: REQUIRED. Main headline combining region name and characterization (40-60 characters).
region._tagline_note: REQUIRED. Supporting tagline that captures region's essence (40-80 characters).

hero._comment: Hero section visual and audio assets
hero._bannerImage_note: REQUIRED. Path to hero image. Recommended: 1920x1080px, landscape orientation, striking composition.
hero._ambientAudio_note: OPTIONAL. Path to ambient audio file (30-90 seconds loop). Can be omitted if feature flag is disabled.
hero._credit_note: REQUIRED. Photo credit line displayed in hero section.

intro._comment: Editorial introduction section with personal voice
intro.headline: Greeting or opening phrase
intro._byline_note: REQUIRED. Author byline. Keep consistent across newsletters.
paragraphs: First paragraph: Opening hook that connects to previous region or establishes tone.
Second paragraph: Sensory description of the region — sights, smells, seasonal context.
Third paragraph: Character and culture — what makes this region distinct.
Fourth paragraph: Why retirees should care — practical benefits, lifestyle fit.
Fifth paragraph: Closing invitation to explore — transition to content.
intro._paragraphs_note: REQUIRED. 4-6 paragraphs, 80-150 words each. Use first-person voice, blend poetry with practicality.
intro._portrait_note: REQUIRED. Path to author portrait. Usually from /images/shared/ directory.
intro._signature_note: OPTIONAL. Path to signature image. Can be omitted.

where._comment: Geographic context, map data, and accessibility information

map._center_note: REQUIRED. Map center coordinates as [longitude, latitude] (e.g., [7.68, 45.07]).
map._zoom_note: REQUIRED. Initial map zoom level (5-10, where 7 shows whole region).

markers._id_note: REQUIRED. Unique identifier for this marker (lowercase, hyphenated).
markers.name: Town Name
markers._name_note: REQUIRED. Display name of the town.
markers._coords_note: REQUIRED. Exact coordinates of town center.
markers.blurb: Brief description of why this town matters (1-2 sentences, 100-150 characters).

map._markers_note: REQUIRED. Include 3-6 key towns/cities. More markers = busier map.
map._externalMapUrl_note: REQUIRED. Google Maps URL for full region view.

tabs.title: Geography
tabs.content: Describe the region's physical geography: mountains, valleys, coastline, lakes, terrain. Include borders, climate zones, and notable natural features. (150-250 words)

tabs.title: Getting There
tabs.content: Detail airports, train stations, highway access, ferry ports. Include travel times from major hubs, international connections, and ease of entry. (150-250 words)

tabs.title: Local Transport
tabs.content: Explain regional trains, buses, metro systems, car necessity, bike infrastructure, and typical commute patterns. (150-250 words)

where._tabs_note: REQUIRED. These three tabs are standard. Maintain consistent structure across regions.

character._comment: OPTIONAL. Visual slideshow conveying regional atmosphere and culture.

slides.caption: Brief image caption (3-7 words)
slides.copy: Atmospheric paragraph about culture, pace of life, or seasonal character (80-120 words).

character._slides_note: OPTIONAL. Include 2-4 slides to build atmospheric narrative.

climate._comment: OPTIONAL. Quick climate comparison across regional microclimates.

modes.label: Climate Zone Name (Town Examples)
modes.notes: Brief description of this microclimate's characteristics (one sentence, 60-100 characters).

climate._modes_note: OPTIONAL. Include 2-4 microclimates if region has significant variation (mountains vs coast, etc.).

towns._comment: Comprehensive town listings: featured deep-dives + grid of quick mentions

featured.name: Town Name
featured.summary: 2-3 sentence overview of the town's character and practical benefits (150-200 words).
featured._summary_note: Appears as preview text before full description.
featured.fullDescription: Extended narrative about town's history, culture, infrastructure, and lifestyle. Use storytelling voice, blend practical details with atmosphere. (400-600 words)
featured._fullDescription_note: OPTIONAL but recommended for featured towns. Rich, immersive description.
featured._mapUrl_note: REQUIRED. Google Maps URL for this specific town.
featured._gallery_note: OPTIONAL. 2-5 additional images showcasing the town.
featured._links_note: OPTIONAL. 1-3 external links to official sites, tourism info, etc.

towns._featured_note: REQUIRED. Include 3-5 featured towns with deep content.

grid.name: Town Name
grid.blurb: Single paragraph describing town's character, practical benefits, and appeal (120-180 words).

towns._grid_note: REQUIRED. Include 8-15 additional towns as quick references.

highlights._comment: Thematic showcase sections: Wine, Food, Culture (customizable categories)

wine.title: WINE — Section Headline
wine._title_note: REQUIRED if section included. All-caps category + em-dash + descriptive phrase.
wine.intro: Opening paragraph setting context for this region's wine culture. Blend history, geography, and cultural significance. (200-300 words)
wine._intro_note: REQUIRED. Establishes tone and importance of this category.
wine._backgroundImage_note: OPTIONAL. Parallax background image for section (1920x1080px).

cards.title: Card Title
cards.subtitle: Supporting subtitle
cards.description: Paragraph describing this specific wine, grape, or tradition (100-150 words).
cards._links_note: 1-2 external links to wineries, wine regions, tourism info.

food.title: FOOD — Section Headline
food.intro: Opening paragraph about regional food culture...

highlights._highlights_note: REQUIRED. These three categories are standard, but you can add custom categories (e.g., 'beer', 'beaches', 'hiking').

collaborator._comment: OPTIONAL. Partner/service feature section (controlled by feature flag)
collaborator.heading: Section Headline
paragraphs: Third paragraph with social proof or details.
Fifth paragraph with call to action.
collaborator._backgroundImage_note: Use shared asset or region-specific background.

wine._comment: OPTIONAL. Interactive wine personality quiz (controlled by feature flag)

result.name: Wine Name
result.note: Description of wine style, characteristics, pairing notes (80-120 characters).

quiz._profiles_note: Include 4-6 wine personality types matching regional offerings.

recipes._comment: OPTIONAL. Regional recipe cards with cooking modes

cards.title: Recipe Name
cards.story: OPTIONAL. Opening narrative about dish's history or cultural significance (100-150 words).
cards.whyRefined: OPTIONAL. For 'Refined' dishes only — why this dish requires precision (60-100 words).
cards._ingredients_note: List all ingredients with measurements. Be specific.
cards._steps_note: Numbered cooking steps. Be precise but not overly technical.
cards.servingSuggestion: OPTIONAL. How to serve, garnish, or present (1-2 sentences).
cards._pairWithWineProfile_note: OPTIONAL. Must match a wine quiz profile ID if quiz is enabled.
cards.winePairing: Specific wine recommendation with tasting notes (60-100 characters).
cards._links_note: OPTIONAL. 0-2 external links to markets, festivals, or detailed recipes.

recipes._modes_note: REQUIRED. These two modes allow filtering. Keep consistent.

healthcare._comment: Infrastructure overview: hospitals, transport, parks, travel times

intro.headline: Healthcare & Infrastructure: Headline
intro.lead: Opening paragraph about region's infrastructure quality and reliability (150-200 words).

hospitals.name: Hospital Name
hospitals.description: Brief description of hospital's specialties and services (60-100 words).

healthcare._hospitals_note: Include 3-6 major hospitals across the region.

airports.name: Airport Name (CODE)
airports.description: Size, connectivity, distance from key towns (60-100 words).

healthcare._parks_note: Include 2-5 major parks or natural areas.

travelTimes._to_note: Include 3-5 key destinations from each starting point.
travelTimes._nearestAirport_note: Can be string or object. Object format preferred for featured towns.

healthcare._travelTimes_note: Include travel time data for 3-5 major towns.
healthcare._quickInfo_note: Standard reference info for quick access.
healthcare.closing: Closing paragraph summarizing infrastructure appeal (60-100 words).

costOfLiving._comment: Interactive cost calculator with town presets and lifestyle sliders

intro.headline: Cost of Living — What It Really Looks Like
intro.lead: Opening paragraph setting expectations about costs (100-150 words).
intro.realityCheck: Paragraph about hidden costs and seasonal variations (80-120 words).
intro.whyItWorks: Paragraph about regional value proposition (80-120 words).

costOfLiving._intro_note: OPTIONAL but recommended. Provides context before calculator.

townPresets.label: Town Name (Type)
townPresets._costs_note: All values in EUR per month for two people. Research carefully using Numbeo, Expatistan, local sources.

costOfLiving._townPresets_note: REQUIRED. Include 3-5 towns representing different cost tiers.
costOfLiving._lifestyles_note: REQUIRED. Keep these three labels consistent.

notes.reference: Costs represent approximate monthly expenses for two people (1-2 bedroom rental).

costOfLiving._notes_note: OPTIONAL. Transparency about data sources builds trust.

prosCons._comment: Balanced pros/cons analysis with nuanced intro and conclusion

intro.headline: Pros & Cons: [Region] Without the Postcard Filter
intro.lead: Opening paragraph establishing region's character honestly (120-150 words).
intro.tradeoff: Paragraph about the fundamental tradeoff of living here (80-120 words).

pros.title: Category Title (e.g., 'Quality of Life')
points: Specific pro point (one sentence, specific and honest).

prosCons._pros_note: REQUIRED. Include 4-6 pro categories, 2-4 points each.

cons.title: Category Title (e.g., 'Reserved Social Culture')
points: Specific con point (one sentence, honest but not harsh).

prosCons._cons_note: REQUIRED. Include 4-6 con categories, 2-3 points each. Be honest but balanced.

finalTake.headline: Final Take: Is [Region] Right for You?
finalTake.text: Paragraph summarizing who this region is for (100-150 words).
finalTake.conclusion: Closing sentence with memorable characterization (20-40 words).

_ctas_note: OPTIONAL. Array of CTA IDs from globals.json. Currently not actively used but may be in future.

closing._comment: Final section with social sharing and farewell message
closing.header: Personalized closing message with subscribe CTA (2-3 sentences).
closing.subtitle: Supporting message about sharing (1-2 sentences).
closing._shareUrl_note: REQUIRED. Canonical URL for this newsletter issue.

socialMessages.facebook: Pre-written Facebook share message (2-3 sentences with context and link placeholder).
socialMessages.threads: Pre-written Threads share message (2-3 sentences, more casual).
socialMessages.bluesky: Pre-written Bluesky share message (2-3 sentences, thoughtful tone).
socialMessages.whatsapp: Pre-written WhatsApp share message (1-2 sentences, personal tone).

closing._socialMessages_note: REQUIRED. Customize for each region to maximize shareability.
